title: Japanese Phrases Mastery Challenge
description: Take on the challenge of mastering Japanese phrases with this quiz. Featuring nuanced greetings, expressions of gratitude, and complex questions, each item offers options, a hint, and the correct answer in Japanese characters and Romaji. Test your proficiency and elevate your Japanese language skills to an advanced level!

items.question: How do you greet someone during the day?
What expression is used to show gratitude or say 'thank you'?
What is the Japanese word for 'yes'?
How do you say 'no' in Japanese?
Which phrase is used as a morning greeting?
What phrase is used to greet someone in the evening?
How do you apologize or get someone's attention in Japanese?
What is the common way to ask 'How are you?' in Japanese?
How do you express appreciation for someone's hard work in Japanese?
What question would you ask when you want to know what something is?
